titleStmt.title: The battell of Alcazar fought in Barbarie, betweene Sebastian king of Portugall, and Abdelmelec king of Marocco. With the death of Captaine Stukeley. As it was sundrie times plaid by the Lord high Admirall his seruants.
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edward Allde for Richard Bankworth, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Pouls Churchyard at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
